info.description:
This is our Safety Helmet project API. Using this public API you will be able to pass any image of a worker and know if the person is wearing a helmet or not. 

 [Project repository](https://github.com/EduFdezSoy/safety-first) 

 [Dataset Repository](https://github.com/sergiorodenas/ml-data)

 Project made by [Rubén Zúñiga](https://github.com/yezarou), [Eduardo Fernández](https://github.com/EduFdezSoy), [Sergio Ródenas](https://github.com/sergiorodenas) and [Raúl Robledo](https://github.com/Nara14) as part of the *Artificial Intelligence Course* by the *Samsung Innovation Campus*.
info.title: Safety First

post.summary: Predict if the person have a helmet.
